title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8037.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8037.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 84. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of IR 84 between the Dutchess-Putnam county
line and the New York-Connecticut state line in the Towns of Kent, Patterson
and Southeast. (b) IR 684. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 684 between the Westchester-Putnam
county line and IR 84 in the Town of Southeast. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8037.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
